channel.title: Other people cant join my server =-= help please
channel.description:
can u help me with one thing ? other people cant join my server. and i got no-ip online. and i have my client open, and logged in by myself. why other ppl cannot join ?
and i portforwarded. and opened my firewall with that port.

item.title: Other people cant join my server =-= help please
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

[quote=“Runeblade912, post:6, topic:227305”][quote author=p e e p z i link=topic=298687.msg2399290#msg2399290 date=1219338965]

Go to http://whatismyip.com/

Have other people try to connect to that ip.

I dont think that would work because the no-ip connect’s to his ip adress already.
[/quote]

The no-ip could be pointing to the wrong ip. Can you take a moment to think before posting like an idiot?[/quote]

I don’t think so and why is everyone so mean on these forums

Read full topic

item.title: Other people cant join my server =-= help please
item.dc:creator: @_Tom_Foolery `Tom Foolery
item.description:
@_Tom_Foolery wrote:

Make sure you have your No-ip (if thats what you used), fully functional. Can you connect to your server yourself?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 21, 2008, 11:09:34 am[/size][hr][quote="`Tom Foolery"]Make sure you have your No-ip (if thats what you used), fully functional. Can you connect to your server yourself?[/quote]

Sorry, I didn’t read your post fully. It’s probably a problem that occured whilst your were portforwarding. Try going over what you did, and if you used a tutorial then maybe you should follow the steps more.

Read full topic
